Lava Z3 Pro (3GB RAM, 32GB Storage)- Cyan | High Performance Octa core Processor| Big 5000 mAh Battery | 8MP AI Dual Rear Camera
description: Z3 Pro enables you to Truly Multitask like a PRO with a powerful Octa core processor. It provides a powerful combination of 3GB + 32 GB ROM powered by MediaTek Helio Octa core processor. It comes with a 8MP dual AI rear camera and 5MP selfie camera for elegant shots. The phone also offers an immersive viewing experience with 6.5 inch HD+ IPS display. Z3 Pro is powered by a long-lasting 5000mAh battery.

Lava Z2 (3 GB RAM, 32 GB Storage), Aqua Blue
description: Z2 promises a power-packed performance with a 2.3 GHz octa-core chipset (MediaTek Helio G35), a 13+2 MP AI dual real camera, an 8MP selfie camera, a 3GB and 32GB RAM/ROM combination. The phone also offers high levels of durability as the 6.5 inch HD+ screen is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 3, and is also military grade certified. Z2 is powered by a long-lasting 5000mAh battery.
